intro:
Color cute animals with crayons!  
Bring the animals of the forest, farm, and ocean to life in your own colors.
description:
Crayon Animal is the newest entry in the Crayon series following Crayon Food, Crayon Dino, and Crayon Halloween.  
This time, a world full of lovable animals comes to life through coloring!  
Color cats, dogs, lions, penguins, and more in any colors you like.  
Relax and paint alone or enjoy a fun coloring time with your family.  
Collect your finished artwork and build your very own crayon zoo!
